short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Ultimate Chrome Extension to Set Time Limits on YouTube for PC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Limit: The Ultimate Chrome Extension to Set Time Limits on YouTube for PC

Commitment to Privacy: Your video playback data is stored only in your browser and cannot be accessed by any third party. When you uninstall the extension, the data will also be deleted.

Update:
* 1.0.2: add limits on the number of video views and total video watching time.

Feature Introduction:
* Set daily viewing time limits
* Track your viewing time
* Provide viewing time statistics

Q&A
Q: Why isn't my video playback history being recorded?
A: Here are the types of playback data that aren't being recorded:
  * Ads
  * Playbacks that are less than 15 seconds long
  * Playbacks that are triggered by moving the mouse to a playlist
